author: ryankask
message: Allow custom User models to use the UserAdmin's change password view.

files.patch:
@@ -133,7 +133,7 @@ def user_change_password(self, request, id, form_url=''):
         adminForm = admin.helpers.AdminForm(form, fieldsets, {})
 
         context = {
-            'title': _('Change password: %s') % escape(user.username),
+            'title': _('Change password: %s') % escape(user.get_username()),
             'adminForm': adminForm,
             'form_url': form_url,
             'form': form,
